subject: Add language specifier to PR review template markdown
description:
**Type:** Task

## Description
Apply the same markdown fix to the template at `all/copy-overwrite/.claude/commands/pull-request/review.md`. This ensures the fix propagates to all Lisa-managed projects.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Template file matches project file changes
- [ ] Line 33 code block has language specifier

## Relevant Research
The template file is identical to the project file and needs the same fix.
This file is used by Lisa to apply PR review command to all projects.

## Skills to Invoke
- `/coding-philosophy` - Always required

## Implementation Details
Files to modify:
- `all/copy-overwrite/.claude/commands/pull-request/review.md` (line 33)

Copy the exact same change from the project command file.

## Testing Requirements
### Unit Tests
- N/A - markdown file changes

### Integration Tests
- N/A - markdown file changes

### E2E Tests
- N/A - markdown file changes

## Verification
**Type:** `manual-check`

**Proof Command:**
```bash
diff .claude/commands/pull-request/review.md all/copy-overwrite/.claude/commands/pull-request/review.md
```

**Expected Output:**
No differences (empty output)

## Learnings
During implementation, collect any discoveries valuable for future developers.
